structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
A FINANCE AND REVENUE OF CITIES

text.section:
Each city shall keep its accounting records and render financial reports in such a way as to:
Determine compliance with statutory provisions; and
Determine fairly and with full disclosure the financial operations of constituent funds and account groups of the city in conformity with generally accepted governmental accounting principles.
Municipal accounting systems shall be organized and operated on a fund basis.

law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 232, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1980.
